Class Menu

java.lang.Object
Menu
public class Menu
extends java.lang.Object
This class contains a group of prompts to acquire input from a user. The input is used to fill out an address entry for the address book.
Since:
02/15/2021

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Menu()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static void addSelected()
    Collects information from the user to use for an address entry which is then added to the address book.
    static char displayMenu()
    Displays a list of options to choose from.
    static void findSelected()
    Searches for the name entered by the user in the address book.
    static void listSelected()
    Lists all the entries in the address book.
    static void loadSelected()
    Asks for a file name then tries to load entries from the file into the address book.
    static java.lang.String prompt_City()
    Prompts for a city and reads it.
    static java.lang.String prompt_Email()
    Prompts for an email and reads it.
    static java.lang.String prompt_FirstName()
    Prompts for a first name and reads it.
    static java.lang.String prompt_LastName()
    Prompts for a last name and reads it.
    static java.lang.String prompt_State()
    Prompts for a state and reads it.
    static java.lang.String prompt_Street()
    Prompts for a street address and reads it.
    static java.lang.String prompt_Telephone()
    Prompts for a telephone number and reads it.
    static int prompt_Zip()
    Prompts for a zip code and reads it.
    static void quitSelected()
    Ends the program.
    static void removeSelected()
    Searches for the name entered by the user and presents a list of results from which the user can select from to remove an entry from the address book.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Menu

      public Menu()

  • Method Details

    • displayMenu

      public static char displayMenu() throws java.io.IOException
      Displays a list of options to choose from. Calls the associated method for the choice selected.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • loadSelected

      public static void loadSelected() throws java.io.IOException
      Asks for a file name then tries to load entries from the file into the address book.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if file has an invalid name

    • addSelected

      public static void addSelected()
      Collects information from the user to use for an address entry which is then added to the address book. A confirmation message is given.

    • removeSelected

      public static void removeSelected()
      Searches for the name entered by the user and presents a list of results from which the user can select from to remove an entry from the address book. After the entry has been removed, the search results are displayed again to confirm removal.

    • findSelected

      public static void findSelected()
      Searches for the name entered by the user in the address book.

    • listSelected

      public static void listSelected()
      Lists all the entries in the address book.

    • quitSelected

      public static void quitSelected()
      Ends the program.

    • prompt_FirstName

      public static java.lang.String prompt_FirstName()
      Prompts for a first name and reads it.
      Returns:
      the name entered.

    • prompt_LastName

      public static java.lang.String prompt_LastName()
      Prompts for a last name and reads it.
      Returns:
      the name entered.

    • prompt_Street

      public static java.lang.String prompt_Street()
      Prompts for a street address and reads it.
      Returns:
      the street address entered.

    • prompt_City

      public static java.lang.String prompt_City()
      Prompts for a city and reads it.
      Returns:
      the city entered.

    • prompt_State

      public static java.lang.String prompt_State()
      Prompts for a state and reads it.
      Returns:
      the state entered.

    • prompt_Zip

      public static int prompt_Zip()
      Prompts for a zip code and reads it. If something other than an integer is entered the prompt displays again.
      Returns:
      an integer converted from the string entered.

    • prompt_Telephone

      public static java.lang.String prompt_Telephone()
      Prompts for a telephone number and reads it.
      Returns:
      the phone number entered.

    • prompt_Email

      public static java.lang.String prompt_Email()
      Prompts for an email and reads it.
      Returns:
      the email address entered.
